itemDescription: British Royal Air Force air marshal

wikipedia_page.main: Air Chief Marshal Sir David Harcourt-Smith,  (born 14 October 1931) is a former Royal Air Force officer who served as Air Officer Commanding-in-Chief at RAF Support Command from 1984 to 1986. He is the author of Wings Over Suez, an account of air operations during the Sinai and Suez wars.

response: *15 Feb 1984 - Air Marshal Sir David Harcourt-Smith
